name: Scabbard of Keen Edges
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Scabbard of Keen Edges

sections.body: This scabbard can shrink or enlarge to accommodate any knife, dagger, sword, or similar weapon up to and including a greatsword. Up to three times per day on command, the scabbard casts keen edge on any blade placed within it.
sections.name: Description
